credit_line: Bequest of Emily Coe Stowell from the Coe Collection
title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1941, Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
1941 - 1970, Emily Coe Stowell
1970, Cooper-Hewitt Museum
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave foundation
description: A list of seven names of members of the Merwine family is embroidered in black in the center: Charles Merwine, Martha Merwine, Thomas Merwine, Ann C. Merwine, Emily Merwine, Charles Merwine, and Elizabeth Merwine.  To the left and right are trees supporting flowering plants; at the top and bottom are large-scale wavy floral vines. The narrow borders are a geometric fret at top and bottom, and a wave-like scroll at the sides.
name: Sampler
